item.title: From ‘Barney’ to ‘Spring Breakers,’ Selena Gomez’s Most Iconic Roles Are Now a Throwback Fashion Line
item.description: Discover a time capsule of career highlights reimagined through limited-edition Y2k-coded sweats, hoodies and tees.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel to Host Selena Gomez’s Third Annual Rare Impact Fund Benefit

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Has a Lot on Its Mind as Season 5 Opens
item.description: There’s another death to investigate, of course, but the Hulu comedy also widens its gaze to a changing New York.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Sets Season 5 Premiere Date
item.description: The new season will also introduce new characters played by Bobby Cannavale, Logan Lerman, Téa Leoni, Keegan-Michael Key and more.

item.title: Emmys Nominations Snubs: ‘Squid Game’ Shut Out, ‘Handmaid’s Tale’ Only Lands One Nod — Uzo Aduba Surprises
